description:
Behind every great historical figure, there are countless individuals working to help make their ambitions a reality. And behind long shadow cast by Toyotomi Hideyoshi was his tactical genius, Takenaka Hanbei!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here Is the Military Genius, Takenaka Hanbei!
Tensai Gunshi Takenaka Hanbee, Koko ni Ari!
天才軍師・竹中半兵衛, ここにあり!
